p:
Tenth, having said all these, we must keep in mind that it is easier said than done. Economically backward countries will undoubtedly face the heat in keeping up to more stringent protocols. The cracks on healthcare resources are already well visible and the hollowness of civilization shining through. It is therefore of supreme importance that the general preventive measures laid down by the WHO are fostered strictly by the general population,
141 and more so by the people more at a risk of stroke, so that viral transmission can be nipped off at the bud.
